title: Foto Watch Face

descriptionHTML:
Foto is a minimal digital watch face for Android Wear that allows you add a personal touch to your Android Wear device.

Any photo as background for your watch face
• You an choose any picture as a background for your watch face: You can use pictures from the online gallery or pictures from your phone
• You can Crop, Rotate, Zoom in/out before applying the picture to your watch

Customise the text of your watch face
• You can search fonts from Google Fonts directly inside the app and have it on your watch face
• You can change the time and date format. Time formats includes 12 Hours and 24 Hours formats.
• You can change the text size, color, and position
• You can enable or disable shadows for the text


Why Foto
• Compatible with round and square watches
• Supports watches with burn-in protection and low-ambient mode
• Minimal
• Battery Efficient


How to use the watch face
1. Download the Android Wear App
2. Install the watch face
3. Launch the Android Wear app on your phone
4. Select the watch face and click the gear icon
5. Express your creativity !

Supported image formats
JPEG
PNG

Data providers
• Backgrounds: Pexels
• Fonts: Google Fonts

Join the Google+ Community to try new features immediately and interact with other users!
Joining the Google+ Community and becoming a beta tester allows you try new features as they arrive before anyone else ! For more info on how to become a beta tester, go to the Google+ Community for Foto Users: https://goo.gl/Kj3vuA


If you have any suggestion or want to report a bug, feel free to contact me by email at charlesloubao95@gmail.com

How to use the watch face

comments: The last watch face you'll ever need. Worth twice the price
recentChanges: [FEATURE] Shadow can be enabled or disabled
